name: Shin Chan Vol. 5
description: Altersfreigabe: Dieser Film ist für Kinder ab 12 Jahren geeignet. Diese Software ist nur auf Englisch verfügbar, Shin Chan is the nickname of the hero, Shinnosuke Nohara. He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Contains the following episodes: Episode 21: Hey, I want a Gold Medal! Treasure Hunter Misae Treasure Hunter Misae Episode 22: Hey, I Play Taxi Driver Gin Goldfinger Gin Goldfinger 2 Episode 23: Hey, We’re Having fun in Australia! 1 Hey, We’re Having fun in Australia! 2 Hey, We’re Having fun in Australia! 3 Hey, Himawari Has a Crush On Kazama! Episode 24: Hey, We’re Still in Australia! 1 Hey, We’re Still in Australia! 2 Hey, We’re Still in Australia! 3 Futaba’s Angels Episode 25: Hey, I Want an Allowance! Hey, Daddy Wants an Allowance Too! Hey, Mommy Wants an Electric Bicycle! Episode 26: Hey, We’re Going on a Picnic! 1 Hey, We're Going on a Picnic! 2 Hey, We’re Going on a Picnic! 3 Hey, We’re a Lazy Bunch!
